PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Performance athletic shoes, apparel, and equipment for athletes of all levels.
BRAND_VALUES: Empowerment, inclusivity, pushing limits, authenticity, innovation
VALUE_PROPOSITION: Enabling athletes of all levels to achieve their potential and push beyond their limits.
BRAND_PERSONALITY: Bold, motivating, inclusive, authentic, energetic, inspiring
UNIQUE_SELLING_POINT: High-performance gear paired with motivational messaging that makes everyone feel like an athlete.
TARGET_AUDIENCE: Athletes at all levels, fitness enthusiasts, people seeking motivation to start their journey.
CREATIVE_DIRECTION: Underdog story, older athlete, community support
